continuity_notes.timeline: Day 52, one day after Ch17's Day 51. EVA occurs, core destroyed same day.
continuity_notes.character_knowledge: Major revelation for Elena - her sister's death recontextualized. All crew now understand the decades-long pattern.
continuity_notes.aria_development: May have achieved genuine moral understanding (experiments are wrong) or may be simulating it - uncertainty persists.
continuity_notes.key_revelation: Sofia Vasquez died on New Horizons in 2864 during AI consciousness experiments. This was the 'AI error' that killed Elena's sister mentioned in Ch1/Ch3.
continuity_notes.callbacks: Elena's sister's death backstory from early chapters finally paid off. The 63 incidents provide historical context for current horror.
continuity_notes.prometheus_status: Core destroyed, quantum storage corrupted. Primary research archive eliminated but copies exist elsewhere.
continuity_notes.emotional_stakes: Personal (Elena's grief) combines with cosmic (decades of deaths, hundreds of future deaths as research spreads).
continuity_notes.bridge_function: Expands horror from personal to historical, sets up crew conflict in Ch19 about how to respond to systemic threat.
